name: Baseball Homerun Duels 2019
description:
The most realistic baseball simulator game “Fantasy Baseball: Sports Games” is here in your hands, experience the real baseball game and master your batting and bowling skills by playing this amazing baseball game. Hit amazing homeruns and get appreciation by the spectators and be a baseball star! Throw the ball, catch-up, and field to get the hitter out! Choose your strategy cleverly and defeat your opponent in these baseball champions matches! Enjoy fast pacing balls, realistic physics and movements, featuring a complete gameplay. Let’s experience the best of the league and try to be on the top place! Your mobile screen is the playground baseball court fingers are bat, flick the ball with the timing and accuracy.
Features and What’s Best:
- Most innovative game-play ever
- 2 game modes: quick play, tournament level mode.
- Team player customization allowing you to create your own fantasy player.
- Amazing game-play with realistic baseball rules.
- Enjoy a speedy, smooth and streamlined playing experience.
- Pitching and fielding as fun as batting.
- Earn gold coins to upgrade ability and buy power-ups.
- Equip your team and players with various items.
- Realistic professional baseball commentary like live TV watch.
- Entertaining gameplay.
- Eye-catching looks.
- Simple pick up and play controls for batting & bowling
